actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Info SET
		user = '{{update_form.fieldState.user.isVisible ? update_form.formData.user : update_form.sourceData.user}}',
		licenceKey = '{{update_form.fieldState.licenceKey.isVisible ? update_form.formData.licenceKey : update_form.sourceData.licenceKey}}',
    dateSold = '{{update_form.fieldState.dateSold.isVisible ? update_form.formData.dateSold : update_form.sourceData.dateSold}}',
		note = '{{update_form.fieldState.note.isVisible ? update_form.formData.note : update_form.sourceData.note}}',
		machine = '{{update_form.fieldState.machine.isVisible ? update_form.formData.machine : update_form.sourceData.machine}}'
WHERE id = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
